snippet.title: Where Can you get the sheet music for Miss Saigon Rhapsody for Piano and Orchestra
snippet.description: A real good place is the URL "pianofiles". Just place a .com on the end of pianofiles and you will get the website. Registration is free and can download or swap music files.

snippet.title: How many octaves does Rhapsody in Blue need to play on piano
snippet.description: The keyboard has to be at least 5 octaves wide unless you're ignoring the 8'Ve signs, descending arpeggios end below A-2, and cross-overs top at A-7.
